Feature: Ecological/Bioregional Layer Value Recognition for Young Adult
  As a young adult making independent consumption decisions
  Operating at the ecological/bioregional governance layer
  I want to understand environmental impacts and make sustainable choices
  So that I balance ecological responsibility with budget constraints

  Background:
    Given the Elohim Protocol is operational
    And the young_adult user "Aisha" is registered in the system
    And Aisha is an independent consumer
    And her choices directly affect ecological systems
    And the ecological/bioregional governance context is active
    And the bioregional_elohim coordinates environmental stewardship
    And Aisha wants to be environmentally responsible within her means

  Scenario: Understanding ecological impact of consumption choices
    Given Aisha's food choices affect environmental systems
    And she wants to minimize negative impacts
    When Aisha selects items in the Value Scanner
    Then the bioregional_elohim should show environmental impact
    And it should explain ecological consequences of different options
    And it should make invisible environmental costs visible
    And she should understand how consumption affects ecosystems
    And ecological literacy should inform decision-making
    And environmental impact should be transparent

  Scenario: Balancing environmental responsibility with budget constraints
    Given Aisha has limited financial resources
    And sustainable options often cost more
    When Aisha makes purchasing decisions
    Then the personal_agent should help navigate trade-offs
    And it should identify affordable sustainable choices
    And it should explain when spending more reduces environmental impact
    And it should validate doing her best within constraints
    And the system should never shame financial limitations
    And environmental responsibility should be accessible at all income levels

  Scenario: Learning about local and seasonal food choices
    Given local and seasonal food has lower environmental impact
    And Aisha is learning about bioregional food systems
    When Aisha shops for produce
    Then the bioregional_elohim should highlight local options
    And it should explain seasonal availability
    And it should teach about her bioregion's food production
    And local food choices should be encouraged when affordable
    And she should learn her region's agricultural patterns
    And bioregional food literacy should develop

  Scenario: Reducing food waste to minimize environmental impact
    Given food waste has significant ecological costs
    And Aisha sometimes buys more than she can use
    When the personal_agent tracks waste patterns
    Then it should identify environmental impact of waste
    And it should suggest waste reduction strategies
    And it should help her buy appropriate quantities
    And waste reduction should be framed as environmental care
    And the system should help her minimize ecological harm
    And practical waste reduction should be taught

  Scenario: Understanding transportation impact on food choices
    Given transportation contributes to food's environmental footprint
    And Aisha lives in an urban area
    When the bioregional_elohim analyzes her shopping patterns
    Then it should consider transportation in environmental impact
    And it should suggest efficient shopping routes
    And it should help her minimize transportation emissions
    And the full ecological cost including transport should be visible
    And bioregional analysis should inform sustainable choices

  Scenario: Participating in bioregional food systems
    Given bioregional food systems reduce environmental impact
    And Aisha could access local food networks
    When the bioregional_elohim surfaces opportunities
    Then it should connect her to farmers markets, CSAs, or food hubs
    And it should explain benefits of bioregional food systems
    And it should help her participate within budget constraints
    And local food networks should be accessible and affordable
    And bioregional participation should support environmental sustainability

  Scenario: Learning about ecological carrying capacity and limits
    Given ecosystems have finite carrying capacity
    And consumption must stay within ecological limits
    When the personal_agent teaches environmental concepts
    Then it should explain ecological limits and boundaries
    And it should help her understand planetary boundaries
    And it should frame consumption within ecological context
    And she should learn that infinite growth is impossible
    And ecological literacy should include limits and constraints

  Scenario: Sustainable protein choices within budget
    Given protein production has varied environmental impact
    And Aisha wants to make sustainable choices
    When Aisha selects protein sources
    Then the bioregional_elohim should show environmental impact differences
    And it should highlight lower-impact protein options
    And it should help her access affordable sustainable proteins
    And plant-based options should be presented when cheaper
    And environmental impact should inform protein decisions
    And sustainable nutrition should be achievable on her budget

  Scenario: Understanding water usage in food production
    Given food production uses significant water resources
    And water scarcity is increasing
    When the bioregional_elohim displays environmental data
    Then it should include water usage in impact assessment
    And it should explain water costs of different foods
    And it should help her choose lower water-impact options
    And bioregional water context should inform recommendations
    And she should understand food-water connections

  Scenario: Packaging waste reduction and recycling
    Given packaging creates environmental waste
    And Aisha wants to reduce packaging impact
    When Aisha makes purchasing decisions
    Then the bioregional_elohim should highlight packaging differences
    And it should suggest lower-packaging alternatives
    And it should provide local recycling and composting information
    And waste management should connect to bioregional systems
    And she should learn to minimize packaging waste
    And circular economy principles should be taught

  Scenario: Climate impact of dietary choices
    Given food production contributes to climate change
    And individual choices aggregate to systemic impact
    When Aisha evaluates food options
    Then the bioregional_elohim should show carbon footprint
    And it should explain climate impact of different choices
    And it should help her make lower-impact selections
    And climate literacy should inform dietary decisions
    And she should understand individual contribution to climate crisis
    And climate-conscious choices should be supported

  Scenario: Connecting to bioregional ecological restoration efforts
    Given her bioregion needs ecological restoration
    And young adults can contribute to environmental healing
    When Aisha explores environmental participation
    Then the bioregional_elohim should surface restoration opportunities
    And it should connect her to local environmental projects
    And her ecological care work should be recognized
    And environmental stewardship should extend beyond consumption
    And she should participate in active ecological healing
    And care tokens should value environmental restoration work

  Scenario: Learning about industrial agriculture impacts
    Given industrial agriculture has severe environmental costs
    And Aisha consumes products of agricultural systems
    When the personal_agent teaches about food systems
    Then it should explain industrial agriculture's impacts
    And it should highlight alternatives like regenerative agriculture
    And it should help her support better food systems
    And agricultural literacy should inform purchasing
    And she should understand systemic environmental issues
    And food system education should enable values-aligned choices

  Scenario: Balancing nutritional needs with environmental impact
    Given Aisha needs adequate nutrition
    And environmental sustainability is also important
    When she makes food decisions
    Then the personal_agent should help balance priorities
    And it should optimize for both nutrition and environmental impact
    And it should never compromise her health for environmental goals
    And human flourishing and ecological health should both matter
    And the system should find win-win solutions when possible
    And trade-offs should be explained transparently

  Scenario: Building lifelong environmental stewardship practices
    Given Aisha's consumption patterns will span decades
    And early adult habits shape lifelong practices
    When Aisha develops consumption patterns
    Then the bioregional_elohim should support sustainable habits
    And it should help her establish environmentally responsible practices
    And patterns developed now should serve her throughout life
    And environmental stewardship should become second nature
    And her generation should normalize ecological responsibility
    And sustainable consumption should be her baseline expectation
